body: Damn, this is sad! I feel bad for both of them.

This is so sad
No horny
Just sad

This is much better than those fake af bullshit and unrealistic romance pick-your-waifu anime. This is peak culture

10/10 better than kimi no na wa
If you look closely at her face in the last panel, you can see still some remnant of her left eye, love the crazy amount of detail that goes into this

From what i understand, a car accident happened which killed the GF and left the BF in coma. The GF becomes a ghost and believes that she was not in the car, she has been at home waiting for her BF to come back. He does, and they have sex. As Ikeda stated, the BF is in a coma so he is emotionless from the beginning to page 15 when she starts to fuck him harder. I guess he feels that even in his coma. When it's all over, she finally realizes the truth.
Damn that just sad. BF lost his GF and GF is stuck in a limbo. Welp, at least the BF when he wakes up and goes on to his life, he has his creepy dead GF haunts him for the rest of life.
I like how iwasaki yuuki always add horror twist in his works
Is that Light Yagami and his news reporter ex-gf?

She's dead and her boyfriend is in a coma. She became delusional and believes her boyfriend is the one who died and is visiting her as a ghost. Notice how the boyfriend is completely emotionless and how she's the one doing all the work? That's because she's fucking his unconscious body.
